rebuild_class(options = {})

Source: show 

# File test/helper.rb, line 63
def rebuild_class options = {}
  ActiveRecord::Base.send(:include, Paperclip)
  Object.send(:remove_const, "Dummy") rescue nil
  Object.const_set("Dummy", Class.new(ActiveRecord::Base))
  Dummy.class_eval do
    include Paperclip
    has_attached_file :avatar, options
  end
end
rebuild_model(options = {})

Source: show 

# File test/helper.rb, line 52
def rebuild_model options = {}
  ActiveRecord::Base.connection.create_table :dummies, :force => true do |table|
    table.column :other, :string
    table.column :avatar_file_name, :string
    table.column :avatar_content_type, :string
    table.column :avatar_file_size, :integer
    table.column :avatar_updated_at, :datetime
  end
  rebuild_class options
end
reset_class(class_name)

Source: show 

# File test/helper.rb, line 35
def reset_class class_name
  ActiveRecord::Base.send(:include, Paperclip)
  Object.send(:remove_const, class_name) rescue nil
  klass = Object.const_set(class_name, Class.new(ActiveRecord::Base))
  klass.class_eval{ include Paperclip }
  klass
end

def silence_warnings
  old_verbose, $VERBOSE = $VERBOSE, nil
  yield
ensure
  $VERBOSE = old_verbose
end
temporary_rails_env(new_env)

Source: show 

# File test/helper.rb, line 73
def temporary_rails_env(new_env)
  old_env = Object.const_defined?("RAILS_ENV") ? RAILS_ENV : nil
  silence_warnings do
    Object.const_set("RAILS_ENV", new_env)
  end
  yield
  silence_warnings do
    Object.const_set("RAILS_ENV", old_env)
  end
end
